mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_HOBBY, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE, MEM_ROLE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{username}

SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_HOBBY, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY, MEM_MILEAGE, MEM_DELETE, MEM_ROLE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_MAIL = #{mail}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NAME, MEM_REGNO1, MEM_REGNO2, MEM_BIR, MEM_ZIP, MEM_ADD1, MEM_ADD2, MEM_HOMETEL, MEM_COMTEL, MEM_HP, MEM_MAIL, MEM_JOB, MEM_HOBBY, MEM_MEMORIAL, MEM_MEMORIALDAY) VALUES( #{memId}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memRegno1}, #{memRegno2}, #{memBir}, #{memZip}, #{memAdd1}, #{memAdd2}, #{memHometel}, #{memComtel}, #{memHp}, #{memMail}, #{memJob}, #{memHobby}, #{memMemorial}, #{memMemorialday})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_NAME=#{memName}, MEM_ZIP=#{memZip}, MEM_ADD1=#{memAdd1}, MEM_ADD2=#{memAdd2}, MEM_HOMETEL=#{memHometel}, MEM_COMTEL=#{memComtel}, MEM_HP=#{memHp}, MEM_MAIL=#{memMail}, MEM_JOB=#{memJob}, MEM_HOBBY=#{memHobby}, MEM_MEMORIAL=#{memMemorial}, MEM_MEMORIALDAY=#{memMemorialday} WHERE MEM_ID=#{memId}
